channel.title: ISRO, Tech & World News - The Hindu
channel.description: Auto-updated feed with ISRO, tech, and world news from The Hindu

item.title: IMF imposes 11 new conditions on Pakistan, warns it against risks to bailout programme: Report
item.description: The Express Tribune report said that the IMF slapped 11 more conditions on Pakistan, taking the total conditions to 50.

item.title: Defence, trade and geopolitics on the cards at U.K.’s ‘reset’ summit with EU
item.description: In its messaging, Downing Street has linked the expected trade announcements with the last week’s comprehensive U.K.-India trade deal and U.K.-U.S. framework trade agreement.

item.title: Gaza talks in Doha now include ending war or truce: PM office
item.description: Israeli strikes across the Gaza Strip killed at least 103 people overnight and into May 18, and prompted the main hospital in northern Gaza to close as Israel intensifies its war in the territory that, after more than 19 months, shows no signs of abating.

item.title: Lufthansa Airbus A321 co-pilot collapses, plane flies on autopilot mode for 10 minutes
item.description: Lufthansa flight to Spain left pilotless for 10 minutes after co-pilot faints, autopilot keeps plane stable

item.title: U.S. Embassy in India warns people staying beyond their authorised period to face deportation or ban on travelling to U.S.
item.description: Earlier in April, U.S. Department of Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem reminded all foreign nationals present in the country for over 30 days that the deadline to register under the Alien Registration Act is April 11
